channel.title: Core - Core model abstractions on tangly Components
channel.description: Recent content in Core - Core model abstractions on tangly Components

item.title: Readme
item.description: Purpose The tangly core component provides a key abstraction for domain-driven development approach and entities with tags and comments. It requires Java 21 LTS or higher. Download and Documentation The library can be included in Maven as <dependency> <groupId>net.tangly</groupId> <artifactId>core</artifactId> <version>0.2.8</version> </dependency> The library can be included in Gradle as implementation "net.tangly:core:0.2.8" The documentation can be found under Core. Awesome Sponsors and Developers Corporate sponsors are tangly llc Individual developers are

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Core Library Change Logs This document provides a high-level view of the changes introduced in the Core library by release. For a detailed view of what has changed, refer to the repository commits. 0.2.8 (2024-09-30) 0.2.7 (2024-05-31) Update of library dependencies, update to JDK-21, and modern Gradle approach to build solutions. 0.2.6 (2021-08-31) Initial release of the library

item.title: Core Models
item.description: Core Models Codes Model The abstraction of a reference table or reference codes. A code table is an extensible set of values. You can add values when needed and extend the model with temporal activation if desired. For example, currencies are typical code values with a temporal duration; well-known retired currencies are the European Currency Unit ECU or the German deutsche mark DM. New values can be added without recompiling the application.
